IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology--Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems--Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Specific Requirements--Part 11: Wireless Lan Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications--Amendment 3: 36503700 MHz Operation in Usa (IEEE Draft Amendment to IEEE Std 802.11-2007)

bibdata.abstract: The scope of the proposed project is the application of 802.11 based systems to the 3650-3700 MHz band in the USA.
